name: Skulloo
description:
Skulloo is Platformer Game, Take the Player to end of the Platform, From starting player's life will be reduces and to gain it back collect the Batteries on your way.

-Levels are continuously adding into game so keep looking for updates.

Game is Also on Steam Greenlight....itch.io Buyers will get Steam keys when it will be available on Steam store.

Steam Greenlight Skulloo
